info.name: CHUNKY CHOOB - Red and Black theme for Youtube
info.description: No borders. No guff. Just flat, fat, chunky and black. Try it once and you'll never look back!!!
info.additionalInfo: I'm bastardisng Youtube to the way I want it to be-flat black solid colors... just trying to get it the way I want. Please try it and let me know of any changes.
